name: IIIN: Interesting, integrated and interactive news
body:
## Keep you updated to things that matter as most people know
The Internet and social networks bring you various ways to access news and events. First, almost news from official publisher sites are updated quite often, based on editors' perspective, not the audiences. In some case, however, they will not reveal what users are really interested about or some sensitive events (political stuff). On the other hand, news that has been viral on social networks (Facebook and Twitter) are biased toward entertainment, showbiz life, weird stuff and not well-categorized. Those are the reasons we will introduce IIIN. 

## How it works
Our system employs the most sophisticated discovery and ranking algorithms. First, we collect tons of websites, blog, Facebook and Twitter pages, tweets, posts, feeds, status. Then a modified version of [Topic Models](https://www.cs.princeton.edu/~blei/topicmodeling.html) is applied to figured it out what people over the Internet is really talking about. Afterward, a ranking system and a categorized system will extract what is the most matter news, fact of each categories. 
![this is very first screenshoot](http://c1.f13.img.vnecdn.net/2015/04/26/1-79-8762-1430021210.jpg)

## Interesting
All the stories we collect are worth to read, because there are thousands to hundreds of thousands people talking about them and we will keep you updated to the most people. These stories is already clean, reducing amount of entertainment and showbiz stuff, increasing amount of worth story in each category: U.S., business, sport, life, technology, science...
![this is very first screenshoot](http://c1.f13.img.vnecdn.net/2015/04/26/1-79-8762-1430021210.jpg)

## Integrated
As you will see, all the story on our application will be integrated with statistical figures to show how many people shares, like, talk about this on web, blog, Facebook and Twitter. There is a simple text version integrated as well.

[http://c1.f13.img.vnecdn.net/2015/04/25/woman-sitting-desk-2078-1429938995.jpg](this screen shoot inside quote)

## Interactive
We provide complete functions to help you interact with the news as you want to express your thought or feeling about this news by sharing with people on IIIN system or posting on Facebook. 

[http://c1.f13.img.vnecdn.net/2015/04/25/woman-sitting-desk-2078-1429938995.jpg](this screen shoot inside quote)

## Below are few screen shoots
We've crafted some handsome templates for you to use. Go ahead and continue to layouts to browse through them. You can easily go back to edit your page before publishing. After publishing your page, you can revisit the page generator and switch to another theme. Your Page content will be preserved if it remained markdown format.

## Progess
